trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest"></xref> class modifies the distinguished name of an object.
This class moves an object to a new parent and/or renames the object.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest"></xref> object.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest"></xref> object using the specified object name, parent name, and new object name.
The current distinguished name of the object.
The distinguished name of the new parent of the object.
The new distinguished name of the object.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.DeleteOldRdn"></xref> property specifies whether to delete the old relative distinguished name (RDN) of the object.
This property is `true` if the RDN should be deleted or `false` if it should not be deleted.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.DistinguishedName"></xref> property contains the distinguished name of the object.
The distinguished name of the object.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.NewName"></xref> property contains the new object name.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.NewParentDistinguishedName"></xref> property contains the distinguished name of the new parent of the object.
The distinguished name of the new parent of the object.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)"></xref> method creates an XML node from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> object.
